responses.rationale: Reports a numerical metric ('totaled more than 17 million') using a standard descriptive verb ('totaled').
Discusses potential economic impacts ('raising consumer prices', 'impacting exports') using standard descriptive verbs.
Reports a consequence ('millions of fowl have been killed') rather than economic data or metrics using standard verbs.
Reports a ranking/metric ('seventh biggest chicken meat-producing state') using standard descriptive language.
